Name: Box: The Game
About the game: You play as a cube and every cube you touch attaches to you and every cube those cubes touch attach to them. The goal is to make the shape on the ground with the colours in the correct spot. Compete with people from all around the world to try and get the least amount of moves using the leaderboard. 50 Levels Colour blind mode Colourful levels Cool shapes Challenging puzzles Leaderboards
